Project Name: Sales (Ephraim) Collection of Interviews by Roy Newquist
Name.repository: University of California, Los Angeles. Library. Department of Special Collections
Name.subject: Bond, James $c (Fictitious character)
Description.note: Ian Fleming - Box 10 #127|~|Transcript (9pp.) available.
Format.extent: 1 sound tape reel (13:28) : analog ; 5 in., 1/4 in. tape
Title: Counterpoint: Ian Fleming
Description.abstract: Ian Fleming discusses the creation of and sources of inspiration for James Bond, the fictional British Secret Service Agent, as well as his thoughts on the series.

Description.note: There are two interviewers heard throughout the recording, Roy Newquist and an unidentified man.|~|Sides 1 and 2|~|Elke Sommer - Box 3 # 37|~|Recording is an already in progress interview with actress Elke Sommer. She is talks about never marrying a fellow actor, and goes on to talk about her career and her approach to acting.|~|At 18:30, Elke Sommer briefly speaks unsympathetically about domestic violence issues.
